contents.text: Welcome to Indeed in San Francisco, your partner in searching millions of jobs online for your next career move.
For job seekers, press 1 to connect with our specialized career support team.
Press 1 to search for new job opportunities.
Please hold while we connect you to a job search specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly find and apply to relevant software engineering roles in the Bay Area.
I'm looking for entry-level cybersecurity positions in the Bay Area that value military experience.
I need to fine-tune my job search parameters and leverage advanced filters with a specialist.
I’m looking for help finding part-time job listings in my area.
Find entry-level research jobs in theoretical physics in the Bay Area

contents.text: Press 2 to update or manage your Indeed profile.
Please hold while we transfer you to your profile management team.

navigationGoals: Update my resume and add my latest certifications to my Indeed profile.
I need to add my service awards and security clearance details to my Indeed profile.
I need to update my profile metadata and adjust my resume parsing settings.
Can someone assist me in updating my work history and contact details on my profile?
Update my Indeed profile with my current PhD research focus and skills

contents.text: For employers and recruiters, press 2 to learn about our talent acquisition solutions.
Press 1 to post a new job opening.
Please hold while we connect you to one of our posting specialists.

navigationGoals: Post a new marketing manager job opening with all listing details.
I want to publish a job listing for my security consulting firm aimed at hiring fellow veterans.
I need to create a new job posting using a structured template with custom tags.
I need to create a job ad for a part-time helper to assist me at home.
Post a new job opening for a lab assistant position in our physics department

contents.text: Press 2 for account and billing assistance.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing discrepancy on my recruiter account and get a copy of the invoice.
I have a question about the recent charge on my employer subscription and need billing help.
I need to resolve billing details, retrieve my invoices, and adjust my subscription tier.
I want to understand a recent billing charge on my employer account.
Review and pay the billing statement for my employer account
